segments.text: Hello . How can we be of service ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm here to see about a Fixed Asset Loan .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , are you already an account holder ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I am . But I'm not sure if I'm eligible .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: To find out if you are eligible for our Fixed Asset Loan , we will have to look at various aspects of your business , such as your long-term business prospects , your cash flow , your profitability , your capital structure ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , and then other qualitative factors , such as the transparency of your business operations , your credibility and the integrity of your management .
segments.speaker: S1
